website_summaries.verdict: Stores and crushes up to six cans in quick succession, and drops them into your bin below.
pros: Can hold up to six 12-ounce cans at a time
Mechanism automatically ejects can from crusher to load the next can
Needs to be mounted in order to work
cons: May jam if you put in six cans
If you crush cans with the opening facing out,  it will squeeze any liquid inside back out

customer_reviews.title: It's gonna last a long time! 😁
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is the left side is open. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Palsrok

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: This is the third can crusher I've bought. The other two offered on Amazon are also sold at Harbor Freight. The first, a single crusher broke with metal fatigue after a year. Otherwise it was okay. The second also sold on Amazon never worked right, it was a multiple can crusher that broke immediately. The ram was plastic and it jammed constantly. This one appears very sturdy a works extremely well. If it is durable, which it appears to be, it will keep the five star rating I gave it. Instruction recommend oiling which is indicative that it is intended to last.
customer_reviews.author: PAE

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed about a month ago, works as stated, no problems. I installed it on a board attached to the garage wall, so it is a little more stable and stands away from the wall a bit, so the cans go directly into the trash can under it. Great Product So Far.
customer_reviews.author: RaqItMama

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CAN CRUSHER EVER
customer_reviews.text: We went through 3 can crushers in 1 month. This one has been a life saver! Super sturdy. Spray the moving areas with wd40 or some sort of lube every once in a while. Even came with a paper of where screws needed to be for mounting. Made set up a breeze. I had it unboxed, up and going in 10 mins. That included the time it took to run the extension cord and find the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Davis

customer_reviews.title: The best can crusher we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a good crusher. We have bought two of these in the past 17 years - they do last very well, plus they are simple to install. And the company has an excellent warranty. The company replaced the first one we had (due to a broken part) when it was a full year out of warranty! The only thing we need to point out is be sure and keep the moving parts well lubricated. That helps greatly toward the longevity of the product. Just wish it wasn't quite as expensive, but in the long run.....it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Too cumbersome and hard to pull.
customer_reviews.text: This crusher does the job but is cumbersome and the paint started coming off the first time I used it. You also have to break the can a little in order for it to crush flat. I am going back to an M 94 model I used to have that worked like a dream. I didn't have to bend the can at all with it. I wish I had stuck with it instead of buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie AM

customer_reviews.title: it is good. some times the cans dont fall down after ...
customer_reviews.text: it is good. some times the cans dont fall down after being crushed and some times the can falls out the side but it does what i need it for. so yes i recommend it. update better off buying single can not multi can crusher. cans jam up faster to drop one ion crush let it drop or help it to drop some times then load another can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t but it.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had it a short time and it is already broken. Had a similar one before and it lasted years. We are seniors and we did not abuse the product. Glad it was not expensive but would have paid more for a better product. Pam
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Can Crusher
customer_reviews.text: I had a unit like this 20 years ago and had to search a bit to find this one. It’s pricey, but like the multi-can hopper system and the sturdy build quality.
customer_reviews.author: KLR59

customer_reviews.title: ... second multi can crusher I have purchased and really like them. I have had a plastic multi can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second multi can crusher I have purchased and really like them. I have had a plastic multi can crusher which broke within a year but used the first of the two of these metal ones for at least 10 years before it needed replacement. I can only assume this one will be just as good since its the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K.

customer_reviews.title: Great crusher
customer_reviews.text: Great can crusher. Have had it for a while now. It is starting to dust a little bit, but it has performed great. The powder coating gets stripped off around the area where metal to metal contact happens that is mainly along the bars that guide or hold the crushing plate steady as it closes in on the cans. Other than that geat crusher.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicBoss

customer_reviews.title: Great product with only one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Well worth every penny. Keep it oiled and support it well when you install it and you will be crushing cans for years. One flaw- The cans pop out the sides. Solution-using the cardboard from the box it came in, I created a guard for each side so the cans stay put. Make sure all moving parts still move freely and you have a perfect crusher. We believe these little discs will pay a higher dividend when recycling for cash than the hand crushed cans and we can go the recycle center less often.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rea

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, sturdy and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We first bought this can crusher years ago and it has performed beyond our expectations. With heavy use, it's still going strong. We recently purchased as second crusher for a friend's cabin. This crusher is exactly like the one we originally purchased, sturdy and well made. Expect it will work well for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Benton

customer_reviews.title: ABOVE all the rest !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled I was able to find a replacement. The previous one I purchased like this finally reached the end use status. It was 10 YEARS AGO and served ABOVE and BEYOND my expectations. The durability is unsurpassed. I may just purchase a few more as gifts for the upcoming holiday season to share with Family and friends. A HIGHLY RECOMMENDED product !
customer_reviews.author: JOHN J WITCHIN JR

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my brother-in-law. He has had one before and liked it, so I ordered another one when his stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Can Crusher
customer_reviews.text: I love this can crusher!! It is perfect for our purpose. It is so easy to install and use that even my husband crushes his own cans.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie K

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be a better unit than the other model offered by Amazon that doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a much better version than the one I'm replacing ....... which is also offered by Amazon. Doesn't last very long. I gave it only 4 stars because of the truly cheap set of instructions that have been copied from copies so many times they're illegible. I'll update this review after using it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Good can crusher
customer_reviews.text: This is the successor to the one I bought many years ago, now worn out. As with the old one, I found I needed to grease the rails on which the plunger slides. I also greased the holes where the plunger bail attaches to the handle. Had I done the latter with the old one, it would probably still be working, but it broke where it wore through. I also found that I had to bend the ends of the plunger bail where it goes into the holes in the handle, or it would slip out near the end of travel. Once you've done all that, it's a very good can crusher.
customer_reviews.author: Maj Robert Mcclure Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The best can crusher on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these for my house, shop, and a lake house, and they all continue to work great! A tip for easy use is to clean the sliding mechanism and lubricate it, as pop/beer will tend to gum up the sliders over time. I have used 1 of them for 10 years and ten thousand or so pops/beers, and it's still operating good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Spencer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these 25 years ago and it was finally wore out. Figured we'd never find anything like it again. Ordered this hoping it would be close, but it far exceeded our expectations. We love the sturdiness and quality. Made even better than the one we replaced. Definetely recomend
customer_reviews.author: MARY L.

customer_reviews.title: Great crusher they like to pop the top one out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great crusher they like to pop the top one out when stacked but it smashes the cans a lot better and faster than my old single crusher
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the tensioner rode bent correctly and adjusted, it works like a champ. Just understand that going in and you'll be fine. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to prior reviews, we were able to make the proper adjustments to our multi-can crusher and it works perfectly. My son, husband, and I love it!! Reviews matter!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Will not return phone calls. Over a week plones messsages full.
customer_reviews.author: j stone

customer_reviews.title: Red Bull cans not so much because of the size
customer_reviews.text: Nice with a bucket under to collect it’s easy and nice to have
customer_reviews.author: james Baker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Initially had to tweak the spring wires that hold the cans in the shoot. Worked well since.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, paint comes off quick in certain areas
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, better than plastic ones, but paint comes off the side supports after first use. Black would have probably been a better color as it wouldn't be so noticeable as the white.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Great item, I get an easy workout, takes less energy to use than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: S L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother wanted this. When I get a house, I'm planning on getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Black cat

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: 1. The cans fall through the sides Had to use duck tape on sides. 2. It is for multiple cans but after crushing one can the next can gets caught up in crusher 3. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gnagi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: A lot cheaper in price but not in quality than the other can crushers on the web
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It works the same as the one I had for 20 years with just one little problem. The silver colored metal plate that slides back and forth had a ruff edge on the top that would catch on the can above. Took my Dremel and ground it smooth now it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Scott Darrington

customer_reviews.title: Had it for years now and still working fine!
customer_reviews.text: Really reduces the clutter of recycling aluminum cans and a good upper body workout too!
customer_reviews.author: JSuz Jones

customer_reviews.title: Functionability Poor!!!
customer_reviews.text: the construction of this unit is superior to any I have seen or used. The functionally is poor. First is loading the cans, which you must almost always "re-position." Second, during crushing, you must almost always "re-position" the cans again. I like this product, but it is just a pain. I just wish someone would manufacture a durable unit that works well!!!!! This is durable, but the operation is terrible. I will buy a cheap plastic unit in the future, and just plan on replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Danner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!! Not cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the can crusher for about a month, but I’m glad I went with one that is study as this. It’s comparable to our previous crusher, which lasted for 10+ year. Hoping it will!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the cans kept getting stuck in the device. I could place one can in the devise at a time......
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Curtis

customer_reviews.title: An amazing crusher. Reduces the volume of the can well
customer_reviews.text: An amazing crusher. Reduces the volume of the can well. I do wish it could take in the bigger cans such as the ones monster drinks come in.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple can crusher.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced same brand model that I had for 14 years that finally wore out. Works as expected,.
customer_reviews.author: RogerH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, crushes cans, maximizes bin capacity, and its fun
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Absolutely love this thing! We drink alot of canned beverages and our recycling container fills too fast, but with this we turned a big bag of cans into a much smaller load. Way more room now for more cans 😄 easy to use and kinda fun.
customer_reviews.author: Century

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice can crusher, I just wish the magazine was longer for more cans.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Insko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This multi can crusher is awesome -- It compresses the cans perfectly - exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K Robinett

customer_reviews.title: Great all metal construction unlke the plastic ones that always ...
customer_reviews.text: Great all metal construction unlke the plastic ones that always break. So far so good have only had a month but crushed a ton of cans already.
customer_reviews.author: jacob bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nees a little adjusting but it is good.
customer_reviews.text: When I first used the product, I stacked 6 cans in it and started crushing. I found that the second can was falling behind the plate after crushing the first can. I had to adjust the guide wire in the back to prevent the next can from falling before it's time. After the adjustment, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. TiehenTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: This product is very well made and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Very good can crusher
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a basic can crusher. Solidly built. The 6-can loading chute is nice. Occasionally a can(especially if it is already dented) will pop out of the loading slot or get misaligned at the crusher. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dieselpower70

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far this has been holding up where the 'plastic' ones failed.
customer_reviews.author: ramshead

customer_reviews.title: first one came broken, second one came broken
customer_reviews.text: the product came broken and the replacement came broken. Too bad, because it seemed sturdy, except for the faulty welds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great can crusher
customer_reviews.text: This saves my back, it limits the amount of twisting to load six cans at a time, then pull the lever six times, the crushed can falls into a pail on the ground and gravity automatically loads the next can and pull the lever again. Very easy to install and operate.
customer_reviews.author: boxer lover

customer_reviews.title: Feels great to recycle
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy. This crusher is awesome! It sure beats trying to crush a can with sledgehammer, foot or hand! It's built with a sturdy metal so it should hold up for a long time of use. Just make sure not to overextend when pushing down. We have found that it works best to leave a couple of cans in the bottom so when you add cans to it they align correctly. It holds five cans. The sliding mechanism works smoothly! We have been recycling cans for years where we did not crush them. It feels great to recycle with less trips to the recycling center! Also, it's fun to use, you get to crush a can in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi R

customer_reviews.title: Love that it holds more than one can at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it holds more than one can at a time. All metal means that it will definitely take a lot longer for something to break.
customer_reviews.author: CORAL

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the plastic ones. Not to say that it's going to last forever, but it is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lethbridge-Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these. The first one wore out after a few years
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdily built and works good. I am happy with it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandfather and he loves it. It was exactly what he was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Wright

customer_reviews.title: Better than using your feet!
customer_reviews.text: This can crusher works well on cans that are not already dented. Avoid denting the cans before inserting them in the crusher. Dented cans tend to hang up or the next can in line will get in the way. Still all in all I am happy with it. I have crushed a lawn bags worth of cans so far and it has performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hooper

customer_reviews.title: metal is a must
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is nice but it just doesn't hold up the metal. Why do you want light weight when your mounting it to a wall anyway? This is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: James Clontz

customer_reviews.title: my husband mounted this on our back deck so we ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband mounted this on our back deck so we can recycle the soda cans when we have friends over.
customer_reviews.author: jay austin

customer_reviews.title: A great buy;
customer_reviews.text: Most stores don't carry a can crusher that holds 6 cans. THe one sent to me came fast. Been using it on a weekly basis. Very durable would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. This is my second of these crushers and they really are reliable and dependable. You can't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TonyRig

customer_reviews.title: Good can crusher
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted something that would fit more than one can. It has worked well since installation. No problems with the exception of us not using the proper screws the first time. I did quite a bit of research and read multiple reviews before making the decision to buy this one. I like it because it's enamel coated white vs. metal too. I thought I would use it more often, but my husband has slowed his intake of canned soft drinks, so I probably use it 4-6 times a months now for a few cans at a time.
customer_reviews.author: E-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I thought it would be stronger than the ...
customer_reviews.text: ^This didn't even last a year. Very disappointed. I thought it would be stronger than the other crushers but it wasn't
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Needed modified
customer_reviews.text: The pins on the actuation arm needed to to be flatten to prevent the pins from coming out. But it works and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Revesco

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The BEST can crusher. We had one just like this that lasted for ten years with constant use! Not only can you crush but you can store six cans and then crush them. Great buy! Quick to receive and then use.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great crusher
customer_reviews.text: This crusher does a great job, very satisfied. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a good crusher at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: but is very good and works well
customer_reviews.text: takes a few mins to figure out which way goes up. but is very good and works well.
customer_reviews.author: donna s dixon

customer_reviews.title: But overall I am pleased with this product and recommend it
customer_reviews.text: When there are 3 or less cans loaded, the cans tend to jump around and misload. Slowing down decreases, but does not eliminate the problem. But overall I am pleased with this product and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Construction is weak
customer_reviews.text: I bought this multi-can crusher and mounted it in my garage. After loading it up for the first time, a pull on the handle did not result in a crushed can. It resulted in the handle popping out of the mechanism. After bending the ends inward a bit, the product can now crush cans. It feels quite flimsy when crushing a can.
customer_reviews.author: Hickabilly

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter and she was thrilled with it. It certainly makes recycling and recycling disposal much easier. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine B. Martorano

customer_reviews.title: Scrap metal
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This thing is garbage. If it was possible to rate it with negative stars, I would. It completely fell apart after 5 cans. The prongs at the rear that are supposed to assure single-feed don't. When I raised the handle to clear the jam, it snapped off. Not worth th $0.95 of recycled bicycle rims it was made from. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: The product came packaged ok but still bent up a bit. It's metal so you can tweak it but works great after that.
customer_reviews.author: Jarad Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought it again!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this product about 10 years ago,when we moved to our current home. It finally gave out last month and I started looking in the retail stores for another. I finally went online and found it and immediately ordered it from Amazon. Any product that holds up that long, gets my return business!
customer_reviews.author: PapaB

customer_reviews.title: Crushed the competition
customer_reviews.text: Great can crushing system. Our kids enjoy using it, where they had previously hated the chore of crushing cans by foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Sometimes the cans get out of wack
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sometimes the cans get out of wack, but seems to work better when opening of can is facing the wall.
customer_reviews.author: MSIII

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective one and called the manufacturer. They sent me a replacement free of charge. This one works perfectly. The lady was a pleasure to talk to and made me happy with their level of customer service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mazarnelli

customer_reviews.title: Not last thinking about getting 2 more these are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of beer I have had 6 they did. Not last thinking about getting 2 more these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Butler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved not having to load 1 can at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Guignet

customer_reviews.title: very conveniant
customer_reviews.text: easy to mount and required very little adjustments .makes saving cans more compact and easy to transport. would recomend to anyone or buy someone for a gift
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Can Crusher
customer_reviews.text: The Aluminum can crusher is sturdy and easy to use. No tweaks necessary, works straight out of the box. No pinching of fingers like some of those other ones I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Had one for many years the new one is not quite as good.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one many years ago and the cage was stainless and the lever arm was smoother. Seems to be fine, will see how well it does. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Basic Industries Can Crusher
customer_reviews.text: It is built with good grade metal not with plastic like the broken one I just thru away,also it crushes the cans smaller taken up less space.Good can crusher,Good price.....
customer_reviews.author: EARL

customer_reviews.title: Multi Can crusher
customer_reviews.text: With the multi can holder on top, you need to watch how far you push the handle back or the cans will flip on you. Overall it is very well built. I would recommend it for anyone who is into recycling aluminum cans.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kornacki

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but only lasted one year.
customer_reviews.text: It only holds 6 cans, but it crushes them great. I recommend this over plastic, especially if you have it in a cold garage. I downgraded the rating. The unit lasted one year. The ends of the handle that pivot bend and reduce the return travel of the handle. I straightened them out several times, each time they bend again after fewer and fewer cans. Eventually one end just broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Wade

customer_reviews.title: They are great if you crush a lot of cans but they ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had two of these before. They are great if you crush a lot of cans but they do wear out and in time they need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Henry D.

customer_reviews.title: We crush a ton of cans!
customer_reviews.text: So much more durable than a plastic can crusher. Lasts for several years with very heavy use. We always re-purchase this very same crusher.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Schrubbe

customer_reviews.title: It's actually too large for a soda can, so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's actually too large for a soda can, so when the cans drop down they get misaligned. Also, one of the steel bars broke away from the rest of the structure. My husband had fix both things. Not worth what we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: cherylmaxine

customer_reviews.title: Basic Industries International 77703 Multi Crush Aluminum Can Crusher
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. We have an old one at the beach and it finally gave out. I looked at several but wanted one like our old one. Easy to operate, smooth operation and built to last!
customer_reviews.author: Squigs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Jams Easily
customer_reviews.text: Crushes cans OK but you have to stop and clear jams every few cans. Cans larger than 12 oz. do not fit.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second can crusher I have purchased from Basic Industries, the first one was 6 years old and had crushed a lot of cans before it wore out. The range of motion is not as good on the new one as compared to the last one I had. The handle does not go back far enough to drop in a can, you have to slide it in from the front and drop it in. Other than that, the crusher works fine.
customer_reviews.author: jim howing

customer_reviews.title: I havnt installed it yet but it is very sturdy, The other 2 were not good and lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third can crusher I have ordered. I havnt installed it yet but it is very sturdy, The other 2 were not good and lasted a month I think this will be around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Crusher- Lame Paint
customer_reviews.text: This can crusher is solid-built and flattens any 12oz can like it was run over by a bus. It loses one star because the paint is cheaply applied and the working components scraped it right off in the first use, and because it will only accept 12oz cans or smaller. Because of the space I have for installing it, I removed the loader rack (easily removed without tools), so I can't say if that works well or not; the crusher on the other hand is amazing in how much it reduces the can volume. I've never seen a manual crusher that so completely flattens a can.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Long

customer_reviews.title: Finally got rid of it and repla ed it with a fiberglass crusher that I had used for years and that one works a whole lot better. Paint immediately started flying off of this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time with this product for some reason. Wouldn't crush cans properly, cans would fall out the side. Finally got rid of it and repla ed it with a fiberglass crusher that I had used for years and that one works a whole lot better. Paint immediately started flying off of this one when I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All metal construction worth it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a plastic one that lasted a whole three months. So far this one has held up beautifully and twice as long. All metal so should keep doing it’s job just fine. Has a few hang ups when you stack too many cans in line at one time but no big deal for us too often
customer_reviews.author: catreenajean

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this outside and has been handling our Montana winter just fine. I really love the heavy duty action. It doesn’t flex or bend while crushing cans, and smashes them down to nothing. Highly recommend for recycling aluminum cans at home.
customer_reviews.author: Will's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It works, and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My parents gave me the one we had in high school, so I hung it up for my kids. Of course, they broke it. I read the reviews to replace it, and I was skeptical. I shouldn't have been. Yes, you can fill the whole magazine with cans. Sure, the paint scrapes off a teeny bit. But not substantially. This product is great. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great product and well-built
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 4 months now and it has worked really well. I have found that crushing the top of the can works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the 20 year old one.
customer_reviews.text: The price is higher today than when I bought one over fifteen plus years ago. (I understand why) The reason for replacement was that the old one had been smashed 10 years ago and the fatigue finally broke. I have great confidence that this new one will last a lot longer. So far it is working better than I remember the other one did.
customer_reviews.author: Dabldoo

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, however
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift, user tells me often how appreciated it is. Works as should. (I got 2 home cooked dinners for it)
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: ULTIMATE CAN CRUSHER!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this can crusher. The first one lasted over 15 years! We kept it oiled very well as stated in instructions and it worked great. We replaced it now because it was used so often and for so many years that the metal got a literal "groove" in it and couldn't be fixed. Our new one works great and I wouldn't ever buy any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: ehh...
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail today. The white coating is scratched off in several locations as if this has been used for awhile before being sent to me. It didn't rub on itself, so I'm not sure how this happened. As long as it works when I attach it to a wall, I guess I'll keep it but not happy about its condition.
customer_reviews.author: cristy nored

customer_reviews.title: This works well and fairly durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-can crusher. The first one lasted about 4 years or so. The main connector bar broke on the first one and I reordered.
customer_reviews.author: The Barbeardian

product_meta.title: Basic Industries International Multi Crush Aluminum Can Crusher
product_meta.description: The Aluminum Can Crusher instantly crushes most cans to about 1-inch. Simply hold the handle and pull it down. Even more, the sturdy all-steel construction is durable. GO GREEN! Save valuable space both where you store the cans and when you transport them. Now you can haul 5 times as many aluminum cans. It means you'll have less trips to the recycling center and each trip will be worth more money. Best of all, you'll be doing your part to help the environment. Recycling is fun and easier than ever with the Crusher.
feature_bullets: Automatically ejects cans into a container
